column2: As an assistant store manager, your role is to support the store manager in overseeing the daily operations of a retail store     You play a key role in ensuring that the store runs smoothly, achieves sales targets, delivers excellent customer service, and maintains a positive work environment for the staff       Here are the primary responsibilities and tasks typically associated with being an assistant store manager:       Team Management: You assist in recruiting, training, and supervising store staff     This includes providing guidance, coaching, and feedback to help employees perform their duties effectively     You also handle scheduling, assigning tasks, and resolving any staff-related issues or conflicts     Customer Service: You ensure that customers receive exceptional service by assisting them with their inquiries, resolving complaints, and providing product knowledge     You lead by example and motivate the team to deliver excellent customer experiences     Sales and Performance Management: You assist in achieving sales targets and maximizing profitability by monitoring sales performance, analyzing data, and implementing strategies to increase sales     This may involve conducting sales training, setting sales goals, and implementing promotional activities     Inventory Management: You assist in managing store inventory, including receiving and organizing merchandise, conducting stock checks, and implementing proper inventory control procedures     You work closely with the store manager to ensure accurate stock levels and minimize shrinkage     Visual Merchandising: You help maintain an attractive store layout and visual merchandising displays that enhance the customer experience and drive sales     This includes ensuring proper product placement, signage, and cleanliness in accordance with company standards
column11: Team management, Sales, Performance management, Visual Merchandising, Product placement, Inventory control, Scheduling, Customer service, Customer experience, Monitoring

column2: Competencies:  Team Management  Communication  Decision Making & Judgement  Customer Focus  Flexibility in terms of time management  Sales Driven  Understanding of Store level profitability/P&L  Understanding of retail metrics like ATV, ASP, Conversion etc Responsibilities:  Lead the recruitment and selection process for Sales Executives, ensuring the acquisition of qualified candidates.  Develop and execute comprehensive training programs for Sales Executives to enhance their skills and product knowledge.  Take ownership of profit and loss (P&L) for the Exclusive Brand Outlet (EBO), implementing strategies to maximize revenue and minimize costs.  Establish and enforce Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to ensure operational efficiency and consistency in service delivery.  Maintain high grooming standards among staff members, reflecting the brand's image and values.  Ensure cleanliness and hygiene standards are upheld in the store premises at all times.  Oversee payment collection processes, managing cash, card, UPI, and gift vouchers efficiently and accurately.  Conduct weekly inventory audits to prevent shrinkage and maintain optimal stock levels.  Ensure compliance with Visual Merchandising guidelines to enhance the store's visual appeal and drive sales.  Build and nurture strong customer relationships to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty.  Provide product knowledge training to all store employees to empower them to deliver exceptional customer service.  Monitor inventory level on a daily basis (MDQ  Planned vs Actual) and share stock requirements on a regular basis to ensure maximum fill rate.  Monitor the performance of product categories within the store and provide insights to the regional and merchandising teams to optimize assortment and drive sales.  Ensure that the store team is fully informed about ongoing promotions and effectively communicate them to every customer, maximizing promotional impact.  Maintain strict adherence to legal requirements such as trade licenses, PPL licenses, and shop & establishment licenses, ensuring compliance at all times.  Proactively identify and address any active project issues or operational snags within the store, minimizing disruption and ensuring swift resolution.  Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with the vicinity management team, fostering collaboration and mutual support.  Regularly update store launch and promotional communication on social media platforms within the vicinity and ensure accurate store location information.  Gather and analyze competition data from nearby establishments to stay informed about market trends and competitor strategies, informing strategic decisions and maintaining a competitive edge.  Implement strategies to manage staff attrition effectively, including measures for retention and engagement.  Drive Below-The-Line (BTL) marketing initiatives to enhance brand visibility and drive footfall to the store. Requirements:  Minimum 7+ years of experience in Retail EBO.  Minimum 4+ years of experience as a Store Manager.  Minimum 4+ years of experience working with an apparel brand.  Well versed with Microsoft Excel, Word & PowerPoint and other MS Office applications.  Well versed with Store POS Applications.  Good interpersonal skills, team spirit and team management experience.  Positive attitude, enthusiastic and team leader.  Fluency in English & Hindi is a must.  Bachelor?? Degree in Business Administration or related field preferred.  Strong understanding of sales and customer service techniques.  Proven history of successfully training sales employees.  Minimum of 2 years of experience as a Store Manager, preferably managing an Exclusive Brand Outlet (EBO).

column1: Store Manager/ Studio Operation Manager| Bangalore
column2: STUDIO OPERATIONS COORDINATOR? Mission The Studio Operations Coordinator is responsible for managing the day-today operations of our studio, ensuring a high level of customer service and driving sales growth. This role requires a highly organised, self-motivated individual with excellent communication skills and a passion for providing an exceptional customer experience. The Studio Operations Coordinator will work closely with the studio team, clients, and HQ sales team to ensure smooth operations and business growth. Responsibilities - Managing the day-to-day operations of the studio, including overseeing walk-in clients and providing exceptional service to customers to turn them into repeat clients. - Build and maintain high energy positive team spirit, strengthen bonding between artists and other team players. - Manage studio atmosphere and hygiene as per the company standards, keeping the Aliens vibe alive all the time. - Provide personalised customer service to create an immersive experience for each customer. - Strictly adhere to studio operational SOPs - Handle inbound queries of the clients, manage appointments, book consultations. - Arrange training sessions for the artists for their skill development. - Developing and implementing sales strategies to increase studio sales, by following up with clients and making 30 calls a day to new inquiries. - Preparing a roster for the team and managing artist transfers and guest spots to ensure that the studio is fully staffed at all times. - Coordinating with the design team and clients to deliver designs on time and meeting client expectations. - Communicating with the HQ sales team to increase sales and identifying process gaps to help the HQ improve processes. - Managing customer complaints and objections in a professional and efficient manner. - Providing daily, weekly, and monthly reports to the reporting manager to keep them informed of the studio's performance. - Accurately maintaining the CRM and data entry to improve data health and drive data-driven decisions for business growth. - Managing daily cash, depositing it in the bank, and updating the records. - Maintaining employee accommodation provided by the company, and being responsible for keeping it clean and free of nuisances. Requirement - College degree in business management, sales, marketing or a related field. - A positive, customer-service oriented attitude, ability to work well under pressure and handle difficult customers, ability to work well in a team environment and a strong work ethic are key attributes for this role. - Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, are essential for this role. - Strong organisational and time-management skills, as well as the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively, are also important. - Prior experience in a similar role, such as customer service, sales, or operations management, could be beneficial. Additionally, experience working in a retail or service-oriented business could be useful. KRA - Sales and revenue growth - Customer delight - Data management - Employee productivity and satisfaction KPI - Studio Revenue (Lagging) - Walk In Conversion 85%+ (Leading) - Daily follow ups and discovery calls (Leading) - NPS (80%+ should fill the NPS Survey) - CRM Audit Score 95%+ (Leading) - Employee Satisfaction 80%+ (Leading) Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Key Responsibilities   Primary Responsibility:   The prime responsibility of Store manager is maintaining customer service. The manager needs to be customer focus and understand their pulse.??  The store manger will need to maintain cash controls at all point in time.  Keeping track of all purchases and maintaining the store facility  Greet customers and provide assistance as and when required  Cleanliness and order in the store need to be maintained at all times.  It is very important that the correct inventory is maintained?  Check received stock against invoices  To mark prices on stock  The Store manager needs to needs to have an understanding in terms of restocking shelves such that the?  Record prices in the log book  Receive cash and provide correct change  Though every register is now moving as a soft copy still there would be a few register that still needs to be maintained  To keep a balance of cash receipts  To make timely deposits of cash and reconcile the same.  To ensure the receipts are printed and are recorded.  To reconcile bank statements  Maintain minimum stock as per the requirement.  Receive indent from respective department and verify the same in terms of the quantity and signature by the authorized signatories.  Verify the availability of materials in stores as per the indent.  Pass the entries in the TALLY software, as and when the transactions occur.  Receive the material and reconcile the same with the purchase order.  Communicate to the purchase department in case of any discrepancy in the quality or quantity of the materials received from supplier  Arrange and tag the materials as per the format.  Verify the stock/materials on a periodic basis.  Handle POS counter and prepare daily POS collection report  Timely updation of MIS  Placing orders towards printing and stationary, Housekeeping, Consumable, Electrical and Consignment items.  Responsible towards control over Linens inventory and staff uniforms.  Receiving the items from suppliers and check the quantity, quality code and expiry date.  Responsible for preparing the Purchase order and GRN.  Responsible to enter the issue requisition in the system.?  Responsible to ensure the clearance from security check for all the received items.  Prepare Gate Pass for Rejected, Consignment and exchanged items.  Ensure submission of monthly statement of Consignment, Consumable, Linen, Instruments and Equipment to the department in-charge.  Responsible to check stock of all items and place the orders.  Obtaining Goods Receipt Note (GRN) and forward the bills to account dept.  The Stores Assistant is responsible to take care of inter dept material issues of Consumables, Consignment, Printing and Stationary and Linen.  Submit monthly reports regarding total purchase, issues and current stock status to the Manager.  The Stores Assistant is responsible to ensure proper co-ordination and good relationship with other Department.  Create schedules to ensure adequate and efficient staffing at all times  Secondary Responsibility:   Report staff hours to the Payroll department and respond to inquiries  Recruit, interview, hire, and train retail sales staff as required  Handling staffing needs and personnel issues  Manage duties and tasks as required in a retail environment  Facilitate clear communication between retail floor staff and office staff  Schedule Product Knowledge sessions with various sales representatives  Provide expert advice to customers in all areas of the store  Proactively build and maintain vendor relationships  Ensure that newly-received product is stocked in a timely manner  Train, Motivate staff and maintain a positive work environment?  Desired Qualification   Graduate in any discipline?  Experience   1-5yrs with prior work experience in Retail Management.   Expected Competencies   Strong numerical and analytical skills required for simple calculations  Good Leadership Skills  Strong oral & written communication skills and interpersonal skills.  Exceptional sales and operational skills in a customer service environment.  Team-building and strong problem solving skills.  Good Liasioning Skills  Skills and Knowledge   Proficient in MS Office suite especially MS-Word, MS-Excel, and MS-PowerPoint.  Understanding of budgeting, asset management & compliance.?

column2: Role & responsibilities     Understand VM norms and ensure that store displays are updated daily to enhance visual appeal and drive sales. Provide exceptional customer service by engaging with customers, understanding their needs, and offering assistance in making purchasing decisions. Maintain a thorough understanding of daily Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and actively work towards achieving and exceeding set targets. Receive stock deliveries, unpack items, and ensure timely and accurate display of merchandise on the sales floor. Stay informed about ongoing offers and promotions, effectively communicate them to customers, and assist them accordingly. Offer comprehensive end-to-end support to customers, guiding them through the buying process and addressing any concerns or questions they may have. Gather and relay customer feedback on products to the store manager to contribute to continuous improvement efforts. Promptly and professionally resolve customer complaints and issues to ensure a positive shopping experience. Monitor stock levels both on the sales floor and in the stock room, replenishing merchandise as needed to maintain optimal inventory levels. column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Assistant Store Manager to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for leading and managing all aspects of the store, including sales, customer service, visual merchandising, and inventory management. The ideal candidate will have a passion for beauty and luxury products, and a track record of driving sales and delivering exceptional customer experiences. Key Responsibilities: 1. Achieve store sales and profit goals by implementing effective sales strategies and customer service initiatives. 2. Drive customer engagement and satisfaction by consistently delivering exceptional customer service. 3. Oversee visual merchandising and presentation standards to ensure a cohesive and attractive in-store experience. 4. Manage inventory levels and replenishment to ensure product availability and minimize stock shrinkage. 5. Lead, motivate, and develop a high-performing sales team, providing regular coaching, feedback, and performance evaluations. 6. Implement and enforce company policies and procedures and ensure compliance with all relevant regulations. 7. Develop and maintain strong relationships with suppliers and vendors. 8. Analyse sales data, customer feedback, and market trends to make informed business decisions and drive continuous improvement. Qualifications and Skills: 1. We are looking for 8+ years of work experince wiith Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or a related field. 2. Proven experience as a Assistant store manager, with a track record of delivering outstanding sales results and customer satisfaction. 3. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and develop a high-performing sales team. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a customer-centric approach. 5. Knowledge of beauty and luxury products, and a passion for the industry is a must. 6. Strong business acumen, with the ability to analyze data, make informed decisions, and drive continuous improvement. 7. Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.
